com.mobixell.xtt
Class HTTPConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.mobixell.xtt.HTTPConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebHttpConstants
public class HTTPConnection
extends Object
implements WebHttpConstants

This class has been written as a replacement of javas http class. It should do most of the job at the momment, including following a 301/302 redirect.

Version:
$Id: HTTPConnection.java,v 1.20 2010/03/18 05:30:39 rajesh Exp $
Author:
Roger Soder

closeConnection

public void closeConnection()
just in case the connection has to be closed client side manually.

readConfiguration

public void readConfiguration()
Reads the configuration from the properties. Values are stored under [MODULE]/[VALUE]

createConnection

public HTTPConnection createConnection(String newname)
Create a connection by reusing the configuration of this connection. Handy if you have a default connection and want to use its configuration as base.
